title: The Story of Mother | Retrospective Documentary

media:group.media:title: The Story of Mother | Retrospective Documentary
media:group.media:description:
Today we begin our retrospective journey through Mother. Although probably the least talked about game in the series, Mother is filled with inspiration, interesting history and incredible themes and music. Not to mention the fascinating localization stories. Thanks to all for checking out the video today, your support means the world to me!

Earthbound Documentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3TepI8eBrh8
